issue.title: [C++] [Parquet] Refactor encoding/decoding APIs for clarity
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6676](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6676). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`encoding.h` and `encoding.cc` are difficult to read and rewrite. I think there's also lost opportunities for more generic implementations. Simplify/winnow the interfaces while keeping an eye on the benchmarks for performance regressions

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6676?focusedCommentId=17565785) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
